attributes.action: DUAL STANDARDS ON ASSISTED DYING - NHS AND THE LEGAL SYSTEM - WRONG
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT `JUST ONE LAW` ON ASSISTED DYING AS AT THIS TIME THERE ARE TWO, NHS AND THE LEGAL SYSTEM WHICH IS WRONG AND BIAS, FAMILY MEMBERS WHO ARE ASKED TO END A LOVED ONES LIFE WHO HAS NO QUALITY OF LIFE IS `NOT ALLOWED` TO END THAT PERSONS LIFE IN LAW, YET THE NHS CAN DO THIS AND GET AWAY WITH IT WHICH IS VERY WRONG AS ABOVE, ONE LAW FOR ALL, NOT TWO.

NEEDS SORTING OUT ASAP.
